SEARCH
Package io.papermc.paper.command.brigadier.argument.resolvers

Interface ArgumentResolver<T>

Type Parameters:
T - resolved type
All Known Subinterfaces:
BlockPositionResolver, EntitySelectorArgumentResolver, FinePositionResolver, PlayerProfileListResolver, PlayerSelectorArgumentResolver, RotationResolver, SelectorArgumentResolver<T>
@Experimental @NullMarked @NonExtendable public interface ArgumentResolver<T>
An ArgumentResolver is capable of resolving an argument value using a CommandSourceStack.
See Also:
  • ArgumentTypes

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    T
    resolve(CommandSourceStack sourceStack)
    Resolves the argument with the given command source stack.
